column2: "〔Xiao, it seems your time has come to meet <%me>.〕"
"Thank you for preparing this area."
"〔Think nothing of it. A favor is a favor. This is how the Dragonkin shows its appreciation. May we meet again.〕"
"Understood. Wait for some good news."
"Nice work Sara. And by the way, I overheard everything you said along the way."
"I said it specifically so you would hear it."
"You really have an interesting upbringing."
"It's probably because of the people I am surrounded by."
"It seems that simply being around you lowers my selfworth-"
"If you finish that sentence, I'm going to hate you forever."
"What do you mean? It was you who said that banter like this would make me appear more human, correct?"
"A-Anyway, there was something you needed to explain. There's no time, right?"
"I really have bad luck with the people I meet... But to introduce myself-"
"My name is Xiao. It's nice to meet you, <%me>. I've heard you've been getting along with Xion."
"To put it simply, I am like Xion's younger brother."
"My goal is her freedom."
"Sorry for calling you all the way out here. It was the only way to avoid being noticed by Luther."
" I asked a lot from Kamitsu of Ro, and caused the Dragonkin a lot of trouble, but I was able to meet you."
"The person Xion has a vested interest in."
"As you can probably tell, ARKS is in a pretty bad state. It's pretty much Luther's puppet."
"But the fact that it still shows some semblance of an organization shows that Luther doesn't completely understand Xion."
"The reason she doesn't use ordinary language is so that Luther can't understand her."
"As such, it must be hard for you to understand as well. So I have to apologize for that much."
"But you've gotten used to it a little, and what she says is starting to make sense, correct?"
"I guess she is coming closer to being human in her own way."
"But that also means that it's easier for Luther to understand her as well. So, we don't have a lot of time."
"That's why I'm trying to act, and working with Sara. I would like for you to act as well."
"To return ARKS to the organization it needs to be."
"It sounds like a lie right? That's what I thought at first, and that it didn't concern me. But it's not a lie."
"I really don't like this kid, and he pisses me off making me do things. Even so, what he said just now is the truth."
"Sara, you still don't understand. I've changed according to your impact, so you might as well be insulting yourself."
"If it hurts you, then I don't mind a little pain in the process."
"Can't say I disrespect that attitude of hurting others at your own expense. I'll sing in your head all night tonight."
"You want to start something? Pull something like that and I'll sing you a elegy."
"Looks like we got off point again. Are you trying to kill my credibility?"
"And whose fault is that?"
"Well, it's not <%me>'s fault."
"Anyways, hearing all of this at once might not be easy to handle."
"That's why I wanted to show you at least some evidence, so that the outcome can be changed."
"Okay, that's it. Now all you need to do is head for the ruins on Naberius."
"That day, the time when Dark Falz gets revived, change it a little so no one notices."
"The day before you met with Maria and Sara, right. That's your goal."
"Don't worry, I'll make the time sync up. All you need to do is what you do normally."
"Then, all you need to do is change one thing. It may not seem like much, but down the line it will make a huge difference."
"Xiao, we're almost out of time."
"Yes, I know."
"This is the limit on what I can explain. To believe it or not... is up to you."
"But for what it's worth, I believe in you."
"Calculation Of The Future"
"第2章\u3000未来の演算"
"Because of your actions, a new path has opened. Story quest【EP1】A Step Toward The Future is now available."
